answers.author: Kathie Novak
answers.text:
I would suggest your state municipal clerks association:  http://www.moccfoa.org/  or the International Institute of Municipal Clerks:  www.iimc.com  or your state municipal league.  Each state is a little different, but the association should be able to help you.
